segments.text: Let me tell you why universal basic income is the only solution to automation.
Every major study shows that automation will eliminate 40 percent of jobs.
The government has a moral obligation to protect its citizens.
Critics say UBI is too expensive but they ignore the cost of doing nothing.
Finland's UBI pilot showed improved well-being and employment outcomes.
Andrew Yang said and I quote UBI is not left or right it is forward.
I predict that within ten years every developed nation will have some form of UBI.
The only question is whether we act now or wait until it is too late.
